trends: There have been 66 other sightings in South Kingstown
There were no other sightings in South Kingstown on or around May 12th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on the roof of the dorm i live in, not drinking, not on drugs, completely sober. i was looking at the stars when i saw a red star which at first i thought was a shooting star, it came from the north then stopped directly above me, move in and out of the big dipper, shot to polaris, then shot to the west. it came back 5 times in similar fashion, just varying the side in which it came from. the ufo appeared immediatley after shooting stars, but had the ability to slow and change directions. the last time i saw it, it appeared as a start sitting still then moved slighlty close to me and did a spiral around the neighboring star and disapeared into space
Summary: red star weaving across the sky varying speed and direction
